Author: ralph
Content:
And the same code as hex-encoded above but with various missing characters, etc., introduced by the posting system.

wget -qO - http://news.ycombinator.com/leaders |

tr '"' ' ' |

sed -n 's/^user?id=//p' |

xargs -ri wget -qO - 'http://news.ycombinator.com/submitted?id={}' |

tr '' ' ' |

sed -n 's/^\([0-9][0-9]\) points by .=\(.\).$/\2 \1/p' |

awk '{c[$1]++; s[$1] += $2} END {for (n in c) printf "%-20s %5d %5d %7.2f ", n, c[n], s[n], s[n] / c[n]}' |

sort +3nr

Cheers, Ralph.

Author: mattculbreth
Title: Should you burn the ships? (basically, go 100% startup or take baby steps?)

Author: mattculbreth
Content: You should add in comments as well I think.  Remember there are karma points here for discussions, as opposed to Reddit's practice.\n
